author: Staff Reporter
text:
Thiyagarajan, Maniyakarar (person in charge of rituals) of Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple has been placed under suspension.

In excess

A. Senthil Murugan from Vadalur complained that Mr. Thiyagarajan has collected Rs.10,000 without receipt from him to give permission to conduct his son’s marriage in the temple on January 20.

People told him that the fee to get permission to conduct marriage in the temple is less than Rs.1,000.

Hence, Mr. Senthil Murugan confronted Thiyagarajan and demanded the extra money he had collected.

Money returned

Though the official was initially reluctant, he finally returned the money after Mr. Senthil Murugan said that he would seek legal recourse and demanded action on the Maniyakarar.

Reacting on this Joint Commissioner/Thakkar of the temple Senthil Velan suspended Thiyagarajan.

The official has collected

Rs.10,000 without receipt from a person
title: Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple maniyakarar suspended
